#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;

               vector<int>new_m;
                 void new_map(vector<vector<int> >&arr,vector<int>&visited,int n,int h2,int u)
                                  {
                                             
                                 
                                  vector<int>::iterator it;
                                  for(it=arr[u].begin();it!=arr[u].end();it++)
                                        {
                                                                                
                                       if(!visited[*it]) 
                                          {
                                          visited[*it]=1;
                                          new_m[*it]=u;
                                          
                                    new_map(arr,visited,n,h2,*it);
                                        
                                          }
                                       
                                                                               
                                        }
                                             
                                  }

int main()
  {
int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
  while(t--)
  {
int n;

int h1,h2;

    cin>>n>>h1>>h2;
    
      vector<vector<int> >arr;
      arr.clear();
      arr.resize(n);
      h1--;
      h2--;
      int x;
      for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
          {
              if(i!=h1)
              {
          cin>>x;
          x--;
          arr[i].push_back(x);
          arr[x].push_back(i)    ;
          
              }
              
              
              
          }
    vector<int>visited(n,0);
   // visited.resize(n);
   new_m.clear();
    new_m.resize(n);
   // memset(visited,0,sizeof(visited));
     new_m[h2]=-1;
     visited[h2]=1;
          new_map(arr,visited,n,h2,h2);
            
            for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
               {
               if(new_m[i]!=-1)
                  cout<<new_m[i]+1<<" "     ;
               }
               
               cout<<endl;
}

   
    return 0;

  }
